string.comment: Menu option to display settings for audio playback

resources.string: Mai te mea e’ita ’oe e fa’a’ohipa i tā ’oe tomora’a i te fa’anahora’a Vaira’a buka ’evanelia, e mo’e tā ’oe mau mea i tāpa’opa’o (mau rēni ’ū, mau mana’o, mau ’api tāpa’o ’e tē vai atu ra).

string.comment: as in Chromecast; send to a different screen

string.comment: title for selecting one of many highlights

string.comment: message stating that a single bookmark was deleted

resources.string: ’Ua hina’aro mau ānei ’oe e haere i rāpae?
"Tauturu: piti fa’atōtēra’a i te paruai nō te fa’a’ore i te piara’a ’ā’ano. "

string.name: download_audio
string.comment: download audio

resources.string: Fa’auta uira mai i te mātēria fa’aro’o
%d mātēria te fa’auta-uira-hia mai.\n\nFa’auta uira i tei mā’itihia?
E fa’a’orehia te mea ato’a e fa’auta-uira-hia ra.\n\nFa’a’ore i te mau fa’auta-uira-ra’a?
’Aita te %s i roto i te mātini. E fa’auta uira i teienei?

string.name: download_video
string.comment: download video

resources.string: Tē fa’auta-uira-hia nei te mātēria fa’aro’o nō %s
Tē fa’auta-uira-hia nei te video nō %s
’Aita i manuia te fa’auta-uira-ra’a nō [%s].\n’Aita i nava’i te vāhi.
’Aita i manuia te fa’auta-uira-ra’a nō [%s].\nHi’o i te natirara ’e tāmata fa’ahou ā.
’Aita i manuia te ha’amaura’a te tāpura’a fa’auta-uira-ra’a
E %d tāpa’opa’ora’a a’ena i roto i te mātini. E aha tā ’oe e hina’aro e rave i te reira?

string.name: female
string.comment: Option for using a female voice for audio playback

resources.string: ’Imi i teie iho parau “%1$s” i roto i te %2$s
Fa’aho’i mai i te buka tāmahana
Ha’amau i te buka tāmahana nō te mau mana’o

Noa atu ā ’ua tātarahia te tuha’a buka tāmahana, ’ua fa’ahereherehia te mau mana’o i tu’uhia. Mai te mea ’ua hina’aro ’oe, e nehenehe e ha’aputu i te mau mana’o ato’a i vai na i roto i te tuha’a buka tāmahana ’e tu’u atu ai i roto i te hō’ē buka mana’o ’āpī e topahia te i’oa e buka tāmahana.
Fa’aho’i i te buka tāmahana tā’āto’a. %d mana’o i fa’anu’uhia.
E fa’a’ohipahia te tomora’a LDS nō te fa’aherehere ’e nō te fa’arōtahi i tā ’oe tāpa’opa’ora’a i ni’a i te mau mātini ’e i ni’a i te LDS.org.

string.name: link_to
string.comment: subtitle for link to Activity... continues sentence for select_text_to_link

string.name: male
string.comment: Option for using a male voice for audio playback

string.name: mark
string.comment: Select highlight color

resources.string: E ’āmui-tahi-hia te mau buka mana’o i mā’itihia. ’A topa i te hō’ē i’oa nō te buka mana’o ’āpī.
I’oa nō te buka mana’o i ’āmui-tahi-hia
I’oa nō te fa’ahoro parau i ’āmui-tahi-hia
Tu’u i roto i te buka mana’o

string.name: network_required
string.comment: Not connected to any network

resources.string: Tītauhia te natirara nō teie ’ohipa. ’A tū’ati i te mātini i te natirara ’āfa’ifa’i ’aore rā i te WI-FI ’e ’a tāmata fa’ahou ā.

string.name: network_wifi_required
string.comment: Not connect to a wireless network

resources.string: ’Ia au i tā ’oe mau fa’atanora’a, tītauhia ’ia tū’ati i te WI-FI nō te rave i te reira ’ohipa.
Tu’u i te ’api tāpa’o nō ’ite ’oi’oi i te vāhi i vaiihohia.
Tu’u i te mau mātēria i roto i te ha’apu’era’a ’ia ’ōhie te ho’ira’a i ni’a iho i te reira
Ha’amau i te mau ha’apu’era’a ta’a ’ē nō te ho’i ’ōhie i ni’a i te reira.
Tē fa’auta-uira-hia ra te mau mātēria
Fa’auta uira mai i te rāve’a fa’aro’o ’e te video nō te fa’a’ohipa i te taime ’aita e natirara
Hi’o i te mea e vai ra, ’ite i te ’ē’a ’e ho’i i reira.

string.name: no_matches
string.comment: No results

string.name: no_notebooks
string.comment: The message to show when there are no notebooks

resources.string: Ha’amau i te mau buka mana’o ato’a ’ua hina’aro ’oe nō te fa’anaho i tō ’oe mau mana’o.
’Aore mana’o i roto i teie buka mana’o
Pāpa’i nō te fa’aherehere i tō ’oe mau mana’o ’e te fa’aurura’a.
’Aore mea e tū’ati i te reira
’Aore fa’ata’ara’a ’aore rā mātēria tū’ati e vai ra

string.name: no_tags
string.comment: The message to show when there are no tags

resources.string: Ha’amau i te hō’ē fa’ahoro parau nō te putuputu i te mātēria e ’itehia noa atu te vāhi i roto i te Vaira’a buka ’evanelia.

string.name: no_tagged_content
string.comment: The message to show when there are no tags

resources.string: ’Aore mātēria i tu’uhia te fa’ahoro parau
Tu’u i te hō’ē fa’ahoro parau i ni’a i te mea ato’a i tai’ohia ’ia ’itehia mai ’āraua’e.
E fa’a’ite te mau mana’o tauturu i te mau ’ohipa au e nehenehe e rave
Mea i roto i te mana’o
Hi’o i roto ia LDS Music
Hi’o i roto i te hō’ē piara’a ’āpī

string.comment: Option to pin the sidebar in an always visible state

string.name: playback_speed
string.comment: Option in audio settings to set the speed for audio playback

string.name: please_sign_in_user_fix
string.comment: Failed to login invalid username or password.

resources.string: Patapata fa’ahou i te tomora’a nō te tātā’i i te i’oa ’e te parau huna.

string.name: pref_downloaded_media_summary
string.comment: description of what this option will allow

resources.string: Fa’anaho ’aore rā hi’o i te mau mātēria fa’aro’o ’e video i fa’auta-uira-hia

string.name: pref_font_size_sample
string.comment: The sample text displayed to the user when updating the font size

resources.string: "… inaha rā, e parau atu vau ia ’oe na, nā roto i te mau mea iti ’e te pāpū ra e fa’atupuhia ai te mau mea rarahi ; ’e nā te mau mea iti ho’i e fa’aha’amā pinepine atu i tei pa’ari ra."
Fa’auta uira ’e hi’o i ni’a i te natirara nā roto noa i te Wi-Fi
Tā’ōti’a i te fa’a’ohipara’a o te natirara ’āfa’ifa’i
’Ua tupu te hō’ē fifi i te ha’utira’a te video.

string.name: recent
string.comment: label for study notebook

string.comment: Double checking removal of content

resources.string: ’Ua hina’aro mau ānei ’oe e tātara i te mau mātēria i mā’itihia?
Tātara mai roto mai i te ha’apu’era’a
Taui i te i’oa o te ’api tāpa’o
Taui i te i’oa o te piara’a
’Ua tītauhia… (tē tīa’ihia ra ’ia tāmata fa’ahou ā)

string.name: search_count_results_subtitle_multiple
string.comment: Message that displays multiple search results alongside the name of content

resources.string: ’Aita ’oe i fa’auta uira i te mea e vai ra nō teie piara’a.\n\n’Ua hina’aro ānei ’oe e fa’auta uira mai i te mea e vai ra nō te “%1$s” i teienei?
Fa’ata’a i te mau piara’a, te tahi i te tahi
Mā’imi i te ta’o ta’a ’ē, te ’īrava ’aore rā te upo’o parau

resources.string: Mā’iti i te tuha’a e tāhono

Tē putuputuhia ra te mau tauira’a
Tē ravehia ra te mau tauira’a
Tē fāri’ihia ra te mau tauira’a
Tē fāri’ihia ra i te tāpura fa’ananea
Tē hāponohia ra te mau tauira’a
Tē hāponohia ra te tītaura’a fa’ananeara’a

resources.string: ’Eiaha e pine i te piara’a hiti
Tē vai ra te fa’ananeara’a, tītauhia rā ’ia haere i ni’a i te Wi-Fi nō te fa’auta uira mai i te reira.

string.comment: High Definition video qualities, e.g. 720p HD

string.comment: video qualities, e.g. 640p
